resources.string: Please select the item to test:
IMPORTANT: All features are not supported, just demo
Scan all audio files on device and create audio_default_playlist.txt file in playlist folder.
Scan all video files on device and create video_default_playlist.txt file in playlist folder.
Delete all logs (Note: All logs in log folder will be deleted).
There is no matched playlist found on playlist folder, please confirm the playlist file on your device.
